settings.text: Shipping to multiple addresses? Feel free to place multiple orders online, or call 1-800-438-4356 and let our customer support team place all your orders for you.

settings.firstpart: You're $price away from Free Shipping Auto-Applied at Checkout! No promo code required.

settings.heading: Our Commitment to Sustainability
settings.description: With every shipment, we have two goals. The first is to make sure that your chocolates are delivered in the highest quality. The second is to reduce our environmental footprint as much as possible. That’s why we include only the materials that are necessary to achieve both. Thank you for choosing Ethel M Chocolates.
